channel.title: Pat Fleet on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Pat Fleet on My New Hugo Site

item.title: More Dialing, More Weirdness
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Almost exactly a year ago, we wrote up a lengthy piece on weird telephone numbers. This piece has been a sleeper hit of sorts in Tedium history. Many of our pieces, if they do gain steam, tend to pick up within a week of writing. Not this one. Instead, the piece went to the top of Google for dozens of variations on the search term “weird phone numbers,” “creepy phone numbers,” and so on.
